name: Aftonbladet.se Adblock + Cleanfix 0.6
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

/* Test 0.6 by trasman */

@-moz-document domain("aftonbladet.se") {

img[src*="ad.aftonbladet.se/RealMedia/ads/"],
embed[src*="ad.aftonbladet.se/RealMedia/ads/"],
img[src*="aftonbladet.se/annons/"],
embed[src*="aftonbladet.se/annons/"],
img[src*="img.aftonbladet.se/annons/"],
embed[src*="img.aftonbladet.se/annons/"],
iframe[src*="ad1.emediate.dk/"],
img[src*="ds-ll.serving-sys.com/"],
embed[src*="ds-ll.serving-sys.com/"],
img[src*="cl314.v4.adaction.se/"],
embed[src*="cl314.v4.adaction.se/"],
img[src*="spe.atdmt.com/"],
embed[src*="spe.atdmt.com/"],
img[src*="img.aftonbladet.se/vinj/bas/ab_nummeruppl_440.gif"],
img[src*="img.aftonbladet.se/vinj/bas/ab_annonspl_440.gif"],
img[src*="aftonbladet.se/vinj/v1/bas/annonstoppbalk_bg_1x40.gif"],
html > body > div#cm8sticky > div#AB_innerBody > div#AB_frameworkContainer > div#AB_mainSite > div#AB_mainContainer > div#AB_artikelytaContainer > div.normalpuffar > div.sektion > a > img,
div#abAdPositionSesamTextads,
img[src*="aftonbladet.se/template/ver1-0/gfx/ads/v1/annonspil_45x5.gif"],
img[src*="aka-cdn-ns.adtech.de"],
embed[src*="aka-cdn-ns.adtech.de"],
img[src*="aftonbladet.se/vinj/bas/bloggtoplist_124x18.gif"],               /* blog skit */
img[src*="aftonbladet.se/blogg/bloggstart/vinj/blogg_box_bottom_bg.png"],  /* blog skit */
img[src*="aftonbladet.se/blogg/bloggstart/vinj/blogg_box_logo.gif"],       /* blog skit */


div.abAdArea#abAdArea_T10,
div#abHeaderAdStreamer,          /* Blocket */
div#tvnublock,                   /* tv.nu */
#abFooterBitosLogo,              /* bitos logo */
div[class*="AB_bloggToplist"],   /* blog skit */
#abLatestBlogPosts,              /* blog skit */
#abBlogPostToolTips,
div[class*="abAdPosition"],
div[class*="abAdArea_"],
div[class*="jobb24"],
div[class*="abJobb24"],
div#AB_bloggToplist_headerContainer, /* blog skit */
div#AB_bloggToplist_contentContainer /* blog skit */
{display:none !important}

}
